lead_paragraph: Craig Smith scored the only goal in the shootout, lifting the Nashville Predators to a 2-1 victory over the Montreal Canadiens on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Smith, Predators Beat Canadiens 2-1 in Shootout
headline.main: Smith, Predators Beat Canadiens 2-1 in Shootout
